source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Drawing & shading beautiful Male and Female face -easy steps

visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute
visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists

items.headline: All the techniques you must know to draw the profiles of a Human face – a basis for Portrait drawing and painting.
objectives_summary: The course has several lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice.
The course provides the learners a good understanding of the structure of face, front and side profile of the face, which would help them to compose any type of facial drawings easily.
By completing all the levels under this course, the learners would understand the complexity of the subject and would learn the techniques of bringing energy and life to their drawings.

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Basic Drawing

visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業
visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY
visible_instructors.name: MANABI

items.headline: How do you create your story and build your world to draw more attractive manga? [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
You can master basic usage of drawing tools.

items.title: Watercolor Mixing for Beginners
items.headline: Creating a Color Wheel in Watercolor
objectives_summary: You will be able to mix any color you'd like in watercolor.
You will learn how to adjust saturation (intensity) and value (lightness or darkness) of your watercolor paints.
You will learn how to apply small areas of watercolor to paper.

items.title: Alcohol Ink and Resin Jewelry Skinny Silicone Molds
items.headline: Make your own fashionable skinny mold jewelry using alcohol ink and Art Resin!
objectives_summary: Create Beautiful and unique jewelry pendants using Resin and Silicon Molds.
See how to use alcohol inks in resin to create dazzling designs
Learn to use a Skinny Mold to create special Crystal pieces.

items.title: You Can Sketch People!
items.headline: Create Expressive Art in 20 Minutes or Less
objectives_summary: You'll be able to create fun, unique, and expressive sketches of people using live models and spending only 20 min or less on each piece.

items.title: Draw & Watercolor Paint 10 Cartoon Animals for Beginners
items.headline: Students Will Learn How to Draw & Watercolor Paint 10 Cartoon Animals Step-By-Step! Course is Perfect for Beginners.
objectives_summary: Create 10 fabulous works of cartoony art inspired by Safari Animals.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: DIY LeatherCrafting: Making Leather Sandals
items.headline: Complete Leather Crafting Course: From Zero to Hero. Learn to make leather sandals from an experienced master
objectives_summary: Understand how modern leather shoes are made
Be able to produce leather sandals of their own, of different designs and forms
Be able to make and sell leather goods

items.title: Crochet for Stress Relief with Patternless Projects
items.headline: Shapes and Basic Stitches for Crochet Beginners
objectives_summary: Create a foundation chain.
Create the American single crochet stitch.
Create the American double crochet stitch.

items.title: Art: Enhance Your Style Series: 1
items.headline: Explore Several Art Styles, Tools, and Techniques
objectives_summary: Learn a fresh approach in creating Expressive Abstract Paintings, Mixed Media, Art Journal Projects, and Collages.
Learn how to intertwine all sorts of genres of Art to create wildly different Expressive Art pieces.
Gain insight into some of the Old Master Techniques and Secrets to enhance and expand your knowledge and skill set.

items.title: Sculpture for Everyone: How to Model an Eagle in Clay
items.headline: Learn the basics of sculpture by modeling an eagle in clay.
objectives_summary: Understand the tools and supplies needed to get started in clay modeling
Sketch an eagle on paper
Create a base where the clay model will stand

items.title: Soap Made Simple! Handcrafting Cold Process Soap
items.headline: The Everyone-Can-Do-It Cold Process Soap Recipe Course Step-by-Step for Beginners
objectives_summary: How to make pure and natural handcrafted cold process soap utilizing only 4 main ingredients
Two methods for making natural cold process soap:  traditional CP method and room temperature method
No math! I provide the ingredient measurements and quantities for you which allows you to focus on how you want to design your soaps.

items.title: How to Screen Print from Home, with Minimal Investment.
items.headline: Learn a Skill, that You can Monetize Anywhere in the World, Low Set-up Costs And The Ability To Print Multiple Colors.
objectives_summary: Build a line table for screen printing anywhere.
Prepare screens for screen printing.
Screen Print multi color eco-friendly prints on any substrate.

items.title: Acrylic Painting Beginners Seascape Projects

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.name: Rod

items.headline: Learn To Paint Seascapes in Acrylics With This Beginners Acrylic Painting Course Featuring 3 Painting Projects To Try
objectives_summary: The basics of painting in acrylics which can also be applied to oil painting
How to paint 3 different seascape painting projects
How to paint a headland at the beach

items.title: Hand Lettering: Learn Three Styles from A-Z

visible_instructors.job_title: Creativity Instructors, Traditional Arts, Digital Arts, Tech
visible_instructors.title: Brainy Pixel Productions
visible_instructors.name: Brainy Pixel

items.headline: Learn hand lettering from A-Z in three cool, distinct styles: graffiti, block, and bubble, all in one simple course!
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw an entire alphabet in a graffiti letter style
Learn how to draw an entire alphabet in a block letter style
Learn how to draw an entire alphabet in a bubble letter style

items.title: Easy Watercolor Paintings; The Ultimate Beginner Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Learn the fundamental skills and how to apply them to create your first masterpieces
objectives_summary: The best affordable brushes
How to manage your palette and avoid wasting dry paint
How to resize paper and retain the rough edge(s)

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Create Character & Draw Human

visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業
visible_instructors.name: MANABI
visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY

items.headline: Let's learn how to create characters who enrich your story! [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
We focus on that you can draw manga rapidly, not become a professional manga artist.
